!Kegor: In the end, even Sirra won't be able to free herself from Freya's shadow. She will be a worse Ice Queen than Freya, if such a thing is possible! No one close to her will ever dare betray her... She learned her lesson well. She makes people fear her until she knows she can trust them. Atrocious!
